title: Nvidia didn't deserve this

Russia's basically being left with the one thing they got going for 'em, cold weather. And in slightly more optimistic news major chip industry players have united in an effort to create an open source interconnect system for chiplets called The Universal Chiplet Interconnect Express or UCIE. UCIE! UCIE! It's delicious to say. A-E-I-O-U. And this is no joke.
